name: H.I.V.E
description:
Final year university solo project focused on utilization of software technology (procedural generation and adaptive difficulty).
HIVE is a sci-fi top-down roguelike shooter. Play as an escaping lab test subject trying to find a way out. However, other test subjects controlled by an artificial intelligence have been unleashed standing in the way of freedom. Battle through these threats with powerful weapons and newly acquired psychic powers. The technology being utilized in the game is procedural generation and AI.
